item.title: AOTM
item.description: AOTM is an intelligent document processing platform developed by Ninestars that uses AI and machine learning for data extraction from business documents.

item.title: Ascron
item.description: Ascron is a Polish intelligent document processing provider specializing in legal services and debt collection management automation.

item.title: Botminds AI
item.description: Botminds AI is a no-code agentic AI platform provider offering intelligent document processing with proprietary AI algorithms and integrated document automation.

item.title: Captova Technologies
item.description: Captova Technologies provides high-speed intelligent document processing for secure and business environments with processing speeds exceeding 100 pages per second.

item.title: Cinnamon AI
item.description: Cinnamon AI is an enterprise AI company offering Flax Scanner, an AI-OCR platform for automated data extraction from unstructured documents without template definition.

item.title: ClearDox
item.description: ClearDox is an AI-powered commodities intelligence platform providing intelligent document processing and automation solutions for commodity trading operations.

item.title: Cogent Labs
item.description: Cogent Labs is an AI company offering SmartRead, an AI-OCR platform for document recognition, classification, and handwriting digitization with 99.2% accuracy.

item.title: Cognaize
item.description: Cognaize is an intelligent document processing company offering hybrid intelligence solutions combining AI with expert-in-the-loop workflows for financial services document automation.

item.title: Cogniquest
item.description: Cogniquest is a context-aware document intelligence platform combining traditional AI and generative AI for intelligent document processing with human-like document understanding.

item.title: Concord Technologies
item.description: Concord Technologies is a healthcare document processing company offering Concord Connect, a straight-through processing platform combining cloud fax, intelligent document processing, and workflow automation.

item.title: Convr
item.description: Convr is an AI underwriting workbench for commercial property and casualty insurance, offering Intake AI for automated submission processing and document digitization with 97% accuracy.

item.title: Coveo
item.description: Coveo is an AI-powered enterprise search platform provider offering unified content indexing, intelligent search, and generative experiences across commerce, service, websites, and workplaces.

item.title: Cytora
item.description: Cytora is a digital risk processing platform for commercial insurance offering AI-powered submission digitization, risk evaluation, and underwriting automation through its risk flow engine.

item.title: Dataiku
item.description: Dataiku is a universal AI platform offering document intelligence capabilities through its data science and machine learning platform with intelligent document processing plugins for text extraction and analysis.

item.title: Celaton
item.description: Celaton is an intelligent document processing provider offering the inSTREAM platform for automated data capture, classification, and extraction from business documents.

item.title: codemantra
item.description: codemantra is an intelligent document processing company offering AI-powered solutions for document accessibility compliance, transformation, and lifecycle management.

item.title: Copysud
item.description: Copysud is a French document management and office technology provider offering Doc In Time, a document management platform with automatic classification, archiving, and secure sharing capabilities.

item.title: Datakeen
item.description: Datakeen is a French AI company offering sovereign document processing solutions with OCR, document authentication, and information extraction through end-to-end encrypted workflows.

item.title: Automat
item.description: Automat is an AI-driven RPA platform using generative AI and computer vision for workflow automation across Windows, Citrix, and web portals.

item.title: Automation Anywhere
item.description: Automation Anywhere is an AI-powered process automation platform provider offering RPA and intelligent document processing for enterprise automation at scale.
